description:
## Features
- Simply Powerful
Minimalistic interface stays out of your way.
Hotkeys make it super flexible.
- Smart
Store your layouts for later,one preset for each of your assets.
- Portable
One single executable,No installation required.

For support or feedback email us at support@kruelgames.com
If you like Kuadro, please consider making a donation to help us develop other free tools like it.
summary: A new way of managing your reference images!
author: Kruel Games
